org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator

Class CreateSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator.CreateSimulator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveMembranesCreateSimulator, ProbabilisticCreateSimulator, SpikingCreateSimultator, TissueLikeCreateSimulator, TransitionCreateSimulator, TSCCreateSimulator

    public abstract class CreateSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides support for creating simulators according to the options defined
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CreateSimulator(java.lang.String model)
      Creates a new instance which creates simulators for the model indicated by its name

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateSimulator

        public CreateSimulator(java.lang.String model)
                throws PlinguaCoreException
        Creates a new instance which creates simulators for the model indicated by its name
        Parameters:
        model - the name of the model which the simulators created should simulate
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if any simulator class doesn't match the expected modifiers

      • createSimulator

        public ISimulator createSimulator(boolean stepBackAllowed,
                         boolean alternativeStepAllowed,
                         java.lang.String simulatorClassId,
                         Psystem psystem)
                           throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                  PlinguaCoreException
        Creates a new simulator, which specific classes are identified by an ID. The possible ID are initially provided by the class itself, and it's necessary to specify the ID of the specific class which will perform the simulation of the p-system
        Parameters:
        stepBackAllowed - if the simulator will allow steps back
        alternativeStepAllowed - if the simulator will allow steps back
        simulatorClassId - the ID which identifies the class to simulate the model
        psystem - the P-system to be simulated
        Returns:
        the simulator created
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if an error occurred during the ISimulator instantiation process
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the simulator instantiation couldn't be committed

      • createSimulator

        public ISimulator createSimulator(boolean stepBackAllowed,
                         boolean alternativeStepAllowed,
                         Psystem psystem)
                           throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                  PlinguaCoreException
        Creates a new simulator. The simulator triplet is the first one available (taken by default), so there's no need to specify an id for it
        Parameters:
        stepBackAllowed - if the simulator will allow steps back
        alternativeStepAllowed - if the simulator will allow steps back
        psystem - the P-system to be simulated
        Returns:
        the simulator created
        Throws:
        PlinguaCoreException - if an error occurred during the ISimulator instantiation process
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the simulator instantiation couldn't be committed

      • getSimulatorsIDs

        public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getSimulatorsIDs()
        Gets an iterator on all simulators IDs
        Returns:
        an iterator on all simulators IDs

      • supportsAlternativeStep

        public boolean supportsAlternativeStep(java.lang.String id)
        Returns a boolean representing if the simulator related to id could be created capable of performing alternative steps
        Parameters:
        id - the simulator identifier
        Returns:
        if the simulator related to id could be created capable of performing alternative steps

      • supportsAlternativeStep

        public boolean supportsAlternativeStep()
        Returns a boolean representing if the default simulator could be created capable of performing alternative steps
        Returns:
        if the default simulator could be created capable of performing alternative steps
